reviews.review_msg: Taken 4 classes w/ her. Best professor I have ever had. She's passionate about teaching, and helpful + supportive. Those who took ENGL 101 and are now complaining, it seems to me you are complaining primarily about the course content. Read the syllabus before you decide to take the class and don't take it if you aren't interested in the content.

Deanna is amazing. The people who have given her poor ratings have been first years upset their English class featured exclusively Aboriginal lit. If you are at all interested in First Nations studies, Deanna is the best prof ever. She is incredibly clever and creates great class discussions and atmosphere. I really recommend FNST 201 with her.
